00029 #ifndef _AP4_DATA_BUFFER_H_
00030 #define _AP4_DATA_BUFFER_H_
00031 
00032 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #include "Ap4Types.h"
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |   AP4_DataBuffer
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 class AP4_DataBuffer 
00041 {
00042  public:
00043     // constructors & destructor
00044     AP4_DataBuffer();              
00045     AP4_DataBuffer(AP4_Size size);
00046     AP4_DataBuffer(const void* data, AP4_Size data_size);
00047     AP4_DataBuffer(const AP4_DataBuffer& other);
00048     virtual ~AP4_DataBuffer();
00049 
00050     // data buffer handling methods
00051     AP4_Result SetBuffer(AP4_Byte* buffer, AP4_Size buffer_size);
00052     AP4_Result SetBufferSize(AP4_Size buffer_size);
00053     AP4_Size   GetBufferSize() const { return m_BufferSize; }
00054 
00055     // data handling methods
00056     const AP4_Byte* GetData() const { return m_Buffer; }
00057     AP4_Byte*       UseData() { return m_Buffer; };
00058     AP4_Size        GetDataSize() const { return m_DataSize; }
00059     AP4_Result      SetDataSize(AP4_Size size);
00060     AP4_Result      SetData(const AP4_Byte* data, AP4_Size data_size);
00061 
00062     // memory management
00063     AP4_Result      Reserve(AP4_Size size);
00064 
00065  protected:
00066     // members
00067     bool      m_BufferIsLocal;
00068     AP4_Byte* m_Buffer;
00069     AP4_Size  m_BufferSize;
00070     AP4_Size  m_DataSize;
00071 
00072     // methods
00073     AP4_Result ReallocateBuffer(AP4_Size size);
00074 
00075 private:
00076     // forbid this
00077     AP4_DataBuffer& operator=(const AP4_DataBuffer& other);
00078 };
00079    
00080 #endif // _AP4_DATA_BUFFER_H_
